BOOLEAN SimGetInputOptions::HideUserInput (   )  const [inline]
 

bit 3: 0 = ME may echo user input on the display | 1 = user input shall not be revealed in any way (see note)

BOOLEAN SimGetInputOptions::PackUserInput (   )  const [inline]
 

bit 4: 0 = user input to be in unpacked format | 1 = user input to be in SMS packed format
